text: Aur apney aap ko unhin kay sath rakha ker jo apney perwerdigar ko subha shaam pukartay hain aur ussi kay chehray kay iraday rakhtay hain (raza mandi chahatay hain) khabardaar! Teri nigahen unn say na hatney payen kay dunyawi zindagi kay thaath kay iraday mein lag jaa. Dekh uss ka kehna na manna jiss kay dil ko hum ney apney zikar say ghafil ker diya hai aur jo apni khuwaishon kay peechay para hua hai aur jiss ka kaam hadd say guzar chuka hai
